condition: I am concerned about my child or someone else getting hurt
condition_name: I am concerned about my child or som
message_text: @fields.child_nickname

Sometimes, our children can have very violent tantrums when they do not get their way, especially if they are used to it. Try to move @fields.child_nickname to a place where they will not hurt themselves or others. You may need to firmly hold @fields.child_nickname while ignoring their behaviour - but only do this if you can remain calm and make sure you are not hurting them! Eventually, @fields.child_nickname will calm down.

Sometimes, our children can have very violent tantrums when they do not get their way, especially if they are used to it. Try to move your child to a place where they will not hurt themselves or others. You may need to firmly hold your child while ignoring their behaviour - but only do this if you can remain calm and make sure you are not hurting them! Eventually, your child will calm down.
